EmailTemplate.subject: Your January issue of Customer Connect is Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Announcing 2020 Operator Conference Dates
The Honeywell Operator Conferences provide a great opportunity to meet face to face with Honeywell representatives and fellow customers in the business and general aviation (BGA) industry around the world. Join Honeywell in 2020 as we host over 61 events worldwide and reach over 2100 customers.
REGISTER TODAY >> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/operator-conferences?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Field Service Engineer Knows Flight Management Systems
Lead Field Service Engineer Bill Nelson knows avionics. He’s got more than 35 years of experience, dating back to his days in the U.S. Marine Corps where he maintained radar systems on the legendary McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom, which he calls “the greatest airplane ever to grace the skies.”
Read More >> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/12/field-service-engineer-knows-fms?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> TECH VIDEO
OF THE MONTH
HTF7000 EEI Install and Setup <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/videos/eei-install-and-setup?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
